description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you a person?  Do you like eating?  Are you adventurous?  Then you'll LOVE this game!  "The Flow" is a frantic 2d platformer - appears easy, hard as cuss.   Don't even THINK OF PAYING FOR THIS GAME - until you've tried the demo. NOW!.. give it a bash, what are you waiting for?!
